name: RetroBot
description: RetroBot is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is part of the WebtrES club. With its classic box-shaped soldier design, classic arms and legs, and a retro console button interface, RetroBot brings a nostalgic charm to the world of robotics. Its screen displays classic visuals, reminiscent of old-school oscilloscopes. RetroBot combines the best of vintage aesthetics with modern technology, making it a unique and visually appealing member of the WebtrES club.
